title: Stop restoring to older version pleassssssssse
body: Bro. Bro. Okay. Bro. My internet is garbo. I keep having to redownload from an older version every time my wi-fi gets cut off. Is there a way to turn this feature off? I like legit left to get taco bell and came back to "We have restored this installation to an older version of league of legends now we will try to...blah blah blah" now i have to wait all night for the patch to finish and prob cant play till tomorrow :c  **TACO BOUT WASTED**

replies.body:
Oooooh man, first of all, this was a treat to read. You sir, have a way with words xD!

Basically what's going on with this is: your game client was able to detect certain files that are damaged/missing/corrupted/eaten by a hungry poro. When it picks up on that, it's trying to fix up those issues but apparently, it doesn't quite fully solve the problem. Try grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool), and make sure to run it with **Force Repatch** turned on. 

Give that tool a go, test it in a custom game, and let me know if that helped!
I will most certainly give it a go my dude. HAHAHAHAHAHA IN THE 50 YEARS IT'LL TAKE TO FINISH DOWNLOADING HAHAH FML ty Rito <3
